rooms.description: Spacious living room with Kerala-style tiled flooring and woodwork detailing, centered in the house for optimal Vastu balance.
Functional kitchen with tiled surfaces, integrated storage and a small dining area adjoining it. Position ensures proper smoke ventilation.
Primary bedroom with ample natural light and north-eastern orientation per Vastu recommendations for health.
Well-ventilated bathroom positioned to the south-west corner as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance with traditional Kerala woodwork and stone accents, positioned in the north-east direction to invite positive energy.
Balcony window providing a transitional space between the indoor and outdoor environment, aligned with local aesthetics.
